params.note: Protocol describes temporal observation of SNR-derived organoid differentiation at Day 3, Day 7, and Day 14 post-isolation, with representative images showing unsuccessful differentiation patterns (no NRs, small NRs <250 μm, multiple NRs). Scale bar: 250 μm. Additional embedding in MG observed at 2 d, 20 d, 2 months, 3 months, and 4 months. Scale bar: 1 mm. No actionable experimental steps with required core ops could be extracted.
